detailsOfAchievement: Ankur Yuva Chetna Shivir is a Lucknow based NGO working for the cause of social development for more than two decades. The emphases in our approach have been on holistic rather than palliative solutions for immediate crises. We see our humble aim as enthuse enough self-confidence in our beneficiaries and volunteers, so that they themselves handle the situations of crises. In this effort, we do not have piecemeal solutions. Our programs aims at unifying the varying initiatives in the fields of health, education, slum improvement, employment generation and improving the financial health of the community into a singular aim of total human development, by the community and for the community.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Cluster demonstration on stress tolerant Rice varieties under IRRI-NFSM Rice for 200 hectares of Suwarna sub 1 and 100 hectares Shushka Samrat in Bhanverkole block and Mohammadabad block of Ghazipur district.Suwarna sub 1 variety is suitable for total submerged condition of Rice due to flood or rain for 17 days.It gives good result of better production up to 6,4 tonnes in a hectare.While other Rice varieties could not survive in 17 days submerged .Shush Samrat Rice variety grow in less water.

CSR -36 Rice variety in 100 hectares changed the scenario of usar land i.e. Saline land where nothing can be grown.This particular variety grow well in saline land and yield is also good.4 tonnes per hectare is the yield.

Rice 100 hectares Suwarna sub 1 Rice varieties was demonstrated with emphasis on Rice Pulse cropping system in tribal belt under NFSM Rice .This is high yield Rice variety suitable for submerged condition for 17 days.

detailsOfAchievement: ASSI as registered NGO was founded in the year 1996 and since then playing a major role in community transformation work. ASSI since its inception, has been working in villages of North and Eastern parts of India with primary aim to help the destitute, neglected, marginalized section of Society with its tag line of Sharing Quality life style through wholesome charitable services. Besides our work in villages, our work has widened in 6 major cities across states such as West Bengal, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Rajasthan, Delhi in north and eastern India. Organization works through its volunteers support who are the part of our45-vocational training centres for women and more than 50 plus literacy and community awareness centres for women and children. We also have two middle level schools for children of poor & underprivileged families in Chehri and Shishua Villages of District Maharajganj, U.P. Community and Society at large counts our contribution as remarkable for the welfare of street children and women empowerment. Following are our programs/projects with which we are doing our bit to uplift section of society as afore-stated who desperately look forward to care and support
